subject: Redirect to Admin Page when logged in
content: When I login, I am redirected to the Admin Page, but I want to be redirected to the Home Page

subject: Dark Mode Request
content: I love the platform! Can we have a dark mode option for a more comfortable viewing experience?

subject: Incorrect Timestamps in Chat
content: Noticing discrepancies in message timestamps. Messages seem out of order. Please investigate.

subject: Integration with Calendar Apps
content: It would be great to sync platform events with external calendar apps. Any plans for this integration?

subject: Export Chat History
content: Is there a way to export chat history for archival purposes? It would be a helpful feature.
